title: Batchify - An AI Product Shot Generator
subtitle: Transform your product photos into high-end studio shots at scale
description: Batchify leverages the advanced multimodal capabilities of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview ("Nano-Banana") as its core engine. The app transforms standard product photos into high-end marketing assets by allowing users to describe a desired background, upload a reference image or let the AI decide for them. Key features include 'Apply to All' for batch consistency, using Nano-Banana's powerful style transfer to apply the same background, lighting, and professional aesthetic across an entire batch of product photos. Smart Background Suggestions analyze uploaded product photos and automatically suggest creative background prompts that complement the product. Batchify is a complete pipeline, from ideation to scalable production, helping e-commerce sellers create studio-quality, customized visuals without the traditional time, cost, or technical know-how.

title: AI Comic Creator
subtitle: Creating comics is traditionally a time-consuming and labor-intensive process, with character consistency
description: Creating comics is traditionally a time-consuming and labor-intensive process, with character consistency across multiple panels being one of the most challenging tasks. Our project, AI Comic Creator, solves this issue by leveraging the advanced features of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana). The system maintains character consistency across multiple panels, making comic creation more accessible and efficient for creators.

title: Red Star Realism
subtitle: Generative AI Propaganda
description: A project exploring generative AI for creating propaganda-style visuals with realistic rendering capabilities.

title: Style Forge
subtitle: Nano Banana powered virtual try-on
description: A virtual try-on application powered by Nano Banana technology, allowing users to experiment with different styles and clothing options through AI-generated visualizations.

title: WorldDress AI
subtitle: Instantly experience traditional costumes worldwide
description: Experience global traditions with a single photo. Pick a country and let our AI transform you in seconds, allowing users to virtually wear traditional costumes from around the world using advanced AI image generation.

title: AI Immersive Chatbot (AI Friends)
subtitle: Immersive AI conversation with consistent visual identity
description: An AI chatbot with consistent image and voice for immersive, lifelike conversation using Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, creating a more engaging and personal AI interaction experience.

title: Improved Video Editing Elements Using Nano Banana
subtitle: Visual Enhancing with Nano Banana
description: A video editing enhancement tool that uses Nano Banana technology to improve visual elements in video content, providing advanced editing capabilities for content creators.

title: AtelierOne: AI Renaissance Portrait Generator
subtitle: Transform your webcam photos into Renaissance masterpieces
description: Transform your webcam photos into Renaissance masterpieces while learning art history through an interactive timeline experience. This tool combines AI image generation with educational content about Renaissance art and techniques.

title: AI Recipe Generator
subtitle: Automatic recipe generation with visual output
description: An AI Recipe Generator web application that automatically generates recipe instructions and completed dish images based on user input, making cooking more accessible and visual.

title: From Awkward Poses to Instagram Worthy – Building My Own AI Photo App
subtitle: AI-powered photo pose and background improvement
description: A project where I built an AI-powered app to help people improve their photo poses and backgrounds effortlessly using Google's Nano Banana technology, transforming amateur photos into professional-looking images.
